page.title: 03THE RIVER NESS AND BRIDGES.
page.content: {THE RIVER NESS}FLOWS THROUGH THE CENTRE OF INVERNESS.IT RUNS FROM LOCH NESS TO THE MORAY FIRTH.IT IS ENJOYED BY YOUNG AND OLD.MANY SPORTS CENTRE ROUND THE RIVER FOR INSTANCE CANOEING, ANGLING AND SWIMMING.PEOPLE ENJOY WALKING BY THE RIVER AND OFTEN STROLL THROUGH THE ISLANDS TO ENJOY THEIR NATURAL BEAUTY.THE ISLANDS HAVE THREE FOOTBRIDGES LINKING THEM TO THE RIVER BANKS.THERE ARE FIVE OTHER BRIDGES OVER THE RIVER.THERE ARE TWO ROAD BRIDGES, TWO FOOTBRIDGES AND ONE RAILWAY BRIDGE.THE BRAHAN SEER,A SEVENTEENTH CENTURY PROPHET,FORETOLD THAT WHEN NINE BRIDGES CROSS THE NESS FIRE AND WATER WOULD RUN THROUGH THE STREETS OF THE TOWN.A NEW BRIDGE OF CONCRETE IS NOW BEING BUILT.WHEN IT'S FINISHED IT WILL BE SEEN WHETHER THE PROPHECY OF THE BRAHAN SEER WILL BE FULFILLED.
